task.prompt: The doctor told Barry to take vitamin D3 for 180 days to help protect him from infections. The pharmacy only sold vitamin D3 in bottles containing 60 capsules, with a daily serving size of 2 capsules.  How many bottles would Barry need to buy to have enough servings to last for 180 days?
